from ACT_HI_DETAIL RES WHERE RES.TASK_ID_ = ?
order by order by RES.ID_ asc LIMIT ? OFFSET ? error.message:
### Error querying database. Cause: org.h2.jdbc.JdbcSQLException: Syntax error in SQL statement "SELECT DISTINCT RES.*
FROM ACT_RU_TASK RES
INNER JOIN ACT_RU_IDENTITYLINK I ON I.TASK_ID_ = RES.ID_
WHERE RES.ASSIGNEE_ IS NULL AND I.TYPE_ = 'candidate' AND (
I.USER_ID_ = ?
)
ORDER BY ORDER[*] BY RES.ID_ ASC LIMIT ? OFFSET ? "; expected "=, NOT, EXISTS, INTERSECTS, SELECT, FROM"; SQL statement: select distinct RES.*
from ACT_RU_TASK RES
inner join ACT_RU_IDENTITYLINK I on I.TASK_ID_ = RES.ID_
WHERE RES.ASSIGNEE_ is null and I.TYPE_ = 'candidate' and (
I.USER_ID_ = ?
)
order by order by RES.ID_ asc LIMIT ? OFFSET ?
